greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of the generalized harmonic number H(n,4,1).
comment: The denominators are in A051539. See A075135 for more details.
Numerators of the partial sums of the divergent series 1/3 + 1/7 + 1/11 + . . 1/(4n-1).
mathematica: a=4; b=1; maxN=20; s=0; Numerator[Table[s+=1/(a n + b), {n, 0, maxN-1}]]
program: (PARI) sumrecip(n,a,b) = { s=0; default(realprecision,n); forstep(j=b,n,a, s=s+1/j; print1(numerator(s)",") ) }
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Sep 04 2002
